trans-unit.source: Represents a processing instruction, which XML defines to keep processor-specific information in the text of the document.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en behandlingsinstruksjon XML definerer beholde prosessor-spesifikk informasjon i teksten i dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateProcessingInstruction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke starte en <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction>direkte; i stedet bruke metoder for eksempel <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateProcessingInstruction%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateProcessingInstruction%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction>

trans-unit.source: The target of the processing instruction; see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Target*> property.
trans-unit.target: Målet for behandlingsinstruksjon; Se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Target*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Target*>

trans-unit.source: The content of the instruction; see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Data*> property.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i behandlingsinstruksjon; Se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Data*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Data*>

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: Det overordnede XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et duplikat av denne noden.

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode`fungerer som en kopi konstruktør for noder.

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, the cloned node always includes the target and data.
trans-unit.target: For å behandle instruksjon noder inkluderer noden klonede alltid mål og data.

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A> method in the `XmlNode` class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se hvordan denne metoden fungerer med andre typer, kan du se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>metoden i den `XmlNode` klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: Det klonede har ingen overordnede (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returnerer `null`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til rekursivt klone undertreet under den angitte noden. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til klone noden seg selv.

trans-unit.source: The duplicate node.
trans-unit.target: Duplisert noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innholdet i behandlingsinstruksjon, unntatt målet.

trans-unit.source: The content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i behandlingsinstruksjon, unntatt målet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sammenkoblet verdiene i noden og alle underordnede verdier.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: Sammenkoblet verdiene for noden og alle underordnede verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter den lokale noden.

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, this property returns the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer målet for behandlingsinstruksjonen for behandling instruksjon noder.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter det kvalifiserte navnet til noden.

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, this property returns the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer målet for behandlingsinstruksjonen for behandling instruksjon noder.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlProcessingInstruction" name="XmlProcessingInstruction" href=""></xref> nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.ProcessingInstruction.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlProcessingInstruction" name="XmlProcessingInstruction" href=""> </xref> noder denne verdien er XmlNodeType.ProcessingInstruction.

trans-unit.source: Gets the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: Henter målet for behandlingsinstruksjonen.

trans-unit.source: The target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: Målet for behandlingsinstruksjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for noden.

trans-unit.source: The entire content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: Hele innholdet i behandlingsinstruksjon, unntatt målet.

trans-unit.source: Node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Noden er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer alle underordnede av noden for den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Because ProcessingInstruction nodes do not have children, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: ProcessingInstruction noder har ikke underordnede, har denne metoden ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer noden på den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.
